data.comment: The match is underway at Freethielstadion.
Fashion Sakala (Oostende) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Alessandro Albanese gives Waasland-Beveren a 1-0 lead in Beveren.
In the minute 46, That's a fine assist from Michael Frey.
Goal! Waasland-Beveren extend their lead to 2-0 through Danel Sinani.
Great play from Joe Efford to set up the goal.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Marko Kvasina with Makhtar Gueye. This is the first substitution made today by Alexander Blessin.
Theo Ndicka is replacing Cameron McGeehan for the away team.
Alessandro Albanese for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Wim Smet and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Waasland-Beveren's Michael Frey has been booked in Beveren.
Arthur Theate is booked for the away team.
Waasland-Beveren make their first substitution with Serge Leuko replacing Alessandro Albanese.
In the minute 82, Sindri Guri is on a sub for Anton Tanghe for Oostende.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) has taken off Georges Mandjeck who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jur Schryvers is the replacement.
That's full-time at Freethielstadion. The final score is 2-0.
The home team replace Joe Efford with Denzel Jubitana.
